;Cheat not usable on Switch because of too low power. Recommended to use with emulators in future
;First pointer values are: 0x0 - default, 0x1 - game menu, >0x1 - blade core opening menu; second pointer: 0x0 - default, 0x1 - cutscene
;Known issues: in 60 FPS some 2D animations are 2x faster
[60 FPS (Auto)]
58020000 00F82308
78020000 008C4CEC
54121000 00000000
58030000 00BD7F40
54131000 00000000
94842030
C0154400 00000000
58010000 00b8f0d0
78010000 00000078
68010000 3C888889 3C888889
08000000 00b74bc0 00000001 00000001
58000000 00F82ED8
78001000 000001E0
78000000 00000BD4
64000000 00000000 0000003C
20000000
C0164400 00000000
58010000 00b8f0d0
78010000 00000078
68010000 3D088889 3D088889
08000000 00b74bc0 00000002 00000002
58000000 00F82ED8
78001000 000001E0
78000000 00000BD4
64000000 00000000 0000001E
20000000
